value.mermaid:
erDiagram
    USERS ||--o{ PROJECTS : "作成"
    PROJECTS ||--o{ DOCUMENTS : "含む"
    PROJECTS ||--o{ SOURCE_CODES : "含む"
    PROJECTS ||--o{ QUALITY_CHECKS : "持つ"
    PROJECTS ||--o{ WORK_ESTIMATES : "持つ"
    PROJECTS ||--o{ PROGRESS_REPORTS : "持つ"

    USERS {
        uuid id PK
        varchar(255) email
        varchar(255) password_hash
        varchar(50) role
        timestamp created_at
    }

    PROJECTS {
        uuid id PK
        varchar(255) name
        text description
        uuid created_by FK
        timestamp created_at
    }

    DOCUMENTS {
        uuid id PK
        uuid project_id FK
        varchar(50) type
        jsonb content
        timestamp created_at
        timestamp updated_at
    }

    SOURCE_CODES {
        uuid id PK
        uuid project_id FK
        varchar(255) file_name
        text content
        timestamp created_at
        timestamp updated_at
    }

    QUALITY_CHECKS {
        uuid id PK
        uuid project_id FK
        varchar(50) type
        jsonb result
        timestamp created_at
    }

    WORK_ESTIMATES {
        uuid id PK
        uuid project_id FK
        jsonb estimate
        timestamp created_at
    }

    PROGRESS_REPORTS {
        uuid id PK
        uuid project_id FK
        jsonb report
        timestamp created_at
    }
